boat.full_description:
Built 1965 to Lloyds 100A1 standards by Porter and Haylett of Wroxham. Originally kept on the south but in Essex for many years. Very much a motor-sailor, she has a 40 hp  Mercedes diesel.

Colour is cream with a maroon top strake, white sails.
boat.name: Yarina
boat.short_description: Yarina is a Peter Duck class yawl
